title: About Me
text:
While completing my undergraduate degree in Management Engineering at the University of Waterloo, the co-op program gave me exposure to data science and machine learning in various environments.
Apart from work, I spend my time playing football, lifting, and going on runs, while trying to brush up on my french.

title: Gaurav Mudbhatkal
text:
Hi, Gaurav here - I am a Data Scientist at Limbik, where I’m leveraging Cognitive AI to proactively respond to misinformation!
As I inch towards my goal of becoming a full-stack Data Scientist, I’m always up to learn something new and work on cool projects. Currently, my interests include LLMs, MLOps, and Climate Tech.
